id.description: Local resource ID. If set on creation, the server may ignore it.

name.description: Human readable name of the resource

description.description: Human readable description of the resource

ultimateFeatureOfInterest@link.description: Link to the ultimate feature of interest (only provided if all observations in this datastream relate to the same ultimate feature of interest)

samplingFeature@link.description: Link to the sampling feature (only provided if all observations in this datastream relate to the same sampling feature)
